column1: This site contains a scatter of fire-cracked rock and a Gary point. It is located on a sandy loam terrace.
Observed a hearth feature with charcoal and burned clay. A Perdiz point was found on the surface.
The area has deep alluvium deposits. An Angostura point was recovered.
Surface scatter of lithic debitage and a Steiner point.
No diagnostic artifacts found, but the soil context suggests deep burial potential.
Found a Trinity point and some FCR.
A Basal Notched point was found near the creek.
